name: Open Playlist
description: Open Spotify to your favourite playlist

username.label: Username
username.help: The username of the person who owns the playlist

playlistId.label: Playlist Id
playlistId.help: The Id of the playlist, you can get this from the share link of a playlist (i.e. the id of http://open.spotify.com/user/benhuggy/playlist/7zn31Ki6T8VX5dadfoJEg7 is 7zn31Ki6T8VX5dadfoJEg7)
